drug.name: Icosapent ethyl
drug.description: Icosapent ethyl or ethyl eicosapentaenoic acid is a synthetic derivative of the omega-3 fatty acid eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA). It is used as adjunct therapy for severe hypertriglyceridemia (TG levels > 500 mg/dL). FDA approved on July 26, 2012.

article.citation: Ballantyne CM, Braeckman RA, Soni PN: Icosapent ethyl for the treatment of hypertriglyceridemia. Expert Opin Pharmacother. 2013 Jul;14(10):1409-16. doi: 10.1517/14656566.2013.798645. Epub 2013 May 24.

drug.indication: Icosapent ethyl is used as adjunct therapy to reduce triglyceride (TG) levels in adults with severe (>500 mg/dL) hypertriglyceridemia.
drug.mechanism-of-action: Studies suggest that EPA reduces hepatic very low-density lipoprotein triglycerides (VLDL-TG) synthesis and/or secretion and enhances TG clearance from circulating VLDL particles. Potential mechanisms of action include increased Î²-oxidation; inhibition of acyl-CoA:1,2-diacylglycerol acyltransferase (DGAT); decreased lipogenesis in the liver; and increased plasma lipoprotein lipase activity.
drug.toxicity: Icosapent ethyl is generally well tolerated and adverse effects are unrelated to treatment.
drug.metabolism: Once converted into active EPA, it is hepatically metabolized into acetyl Coenzyme A via beta-oxidation.
drug.absorption: Icosapent ethyl is de-esterfied, converted into active EPA, and then absorbed in the small intestine. It reaches peak plasma concentration in 5 hours post-oral administration. Very little (<1%) is left circulating in the plasma as EPA incorporates into phospholipids, TG's, and cholesteryl esters.
drug.half-life: The half life of EPA is 89 hours.
drug.route-of-elimination: Icosapent ethyl is not renally excreted
drug.volume-of-distribution: Steady state volume of distribution of active EPA is 88 L

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as fatty acid esters. These are carboxylic ester derivatives of a fatty acid.

mixture.name: Vp-pnv-dha
mixture.ingredients: Ascorbic acid + Calcium carbonate + Cholecalciferol + Cupric sulfate + Cyanocobalamin + Doconexent + Ferrous fumarate + Folic acid + Icosapent ethyl + Magnesium oxide + Niacin + Pyridoxine + Riboflavin + Thiamine + Vitamin A + Vitamin E + Zinc oxide

mixture.name: Calcium PNV
mixture.ingredients: Ascorbic acid + Calcium Phosphate + Doconexent + Ferrous fumarate + Folic acid + Icosapent ethyl + Pyridoxine + Vitamin E
